credit_line: Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds
title: Two Studies of the Interior, Villa Stein-de Monzie, Garches, France
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
medium: Pen and brown ink, graphite on cardboard, mounted on canvas
description: Two early concept drawings for villa, in perspective, of two levels of interior with mezzanine, one view from above, one view from below opening to upper level.  Ground floor with partial stair showing at left, enclosed stairs at center, rear, mezzanine center rear and right, strip windows on upper level, left and right.  Upper level showing mezzanine with stairs leading down at far right, strip windows at left and right, and walls to outside terrace on left, adjacent to mezzanine walkway.
name: Drawing
